participant_1.background:
I am more of a cat person than a dog person.
I could not live without my cell phone.
I enjoy the occasional drink with friends.
I attend book club every week.
My mom is my best friend.

participant_2.background:
I live in the city.
I went to college and graduated few years ago.
Now i also work at a bank.
I grew up in the upstate.
My father used to work for a bank.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to go out to eat with friends, go to concerts, and read books.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun! I like to read books too, what are some of your favorite books?
I love to read historical fiction and fantasy novels. Some of my favorite books are The Lord of the Rings series, The Harry Potter series, and The Hunger Games series.
I love those books too! I'm a big fan of fantasy and science fiction. I also like to read historical fiction.
It's nice to meet someone who likes the same books as me.
Me too! What are some of your favorite authors?
I love J.R.R. Tolkien, J.K. Rowling, and Suzanne Collins.
Me too! I also love George R.R. Martin, Terry Pratchett, and Neil Gaiman.
Those are great authors! I've read some of their books, but I haven't read all of them.
I've read all of them. I'm a big fan of their work.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. We should get together and read books together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to read books with you.
Great! We can exchange numbers and set up a time to meet.
Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it.
